channel.title: Can applications be future-proofed?
channel.description:
Technology progresses rapidly, even exponentially at times. This is awesome, but when it comes to app development, it can mean spending hours updating apps, keeping them up to date and functional.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/whats-a-future-proof-application/
